es.eucm.eadandroid.resources.resourcehandler
Class ResourceHandler

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.resources.resourcehandler.ResourceHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputStreamCreator
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceHandlerExternalSource, ResourceHandlerRestricted, ResourceHandlerUnrestricted
public abstract class ResourceHandler
extends Object
implements InputStreamCreator

Abstract class in charge of loading the resources (files) of the game
